text: Imi vanotenda (vanotenda muhumwe hwaAllah)! Zvirokwazvo, maMushrikoon (avo vasingatendi muhumwe hwaAllah) vakasviba. Naizvozvo vasauya padyo neAl-Masjid Al-Haraam (kuMakkah) kana gore iri rapera; uye kana muchitya urombo, Allah vachakuitai vapfumi kana vachida, kuburikidza nehupfumi hwavo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva zvose, vane huchenjeri hwese
